data.eml:eml: Two new, possibly threatened species of Pyrgulopsis (Gastropoda: Hydrobiidae) from southwestern California

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hershler, Robert, Liu, Hsiu-Ping (2010): Two new, possibly threatened species of Pyrgulopsis (Gastropoda: Hydrobiidae) from southwestern California. Zootaxa 2343: 1-17, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.193333
